alert.note: Alert for Appanoose; Davis; Monroe; Wapello; Wayne (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 21 at 9:28AM CST until January 22 at 12:00PM CST by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...Wintry Mix Southeast Overnight into Monday Morning... .Temperatures are warming quickly this morning and wind chills have warmed as well. Therefore, the Wind Chill Advisory has been cancelled. A light wintry mix of freezing rain or sleet is expected southeast late tonight into Monday morning. While any ice or sleet accumulations should be light, they may still be sufficient for slick roads and travel impacts. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO NOON CST MONDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Portions of far southeast Iowa. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to noon CST Monday. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. For the latest travel conditions, check the Iowa 511 app, www.511ia.org, or dial 511.
